title: The Kids Built It
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 46 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 20L
description: Discovering how to build can lead to all kinds of entertainment! The Kids Built It provides students a colorful look at what kids can build using their imagination and everyday objects. Repetitive sentences and detailed illustrations support emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast and to write complete sentences.
reviewWords: built, city, house, park, road, store
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast details in a text
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
grammar: Complete Sentences                : Recognize and use complete sentences
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
